item.description: Process automation ðŸš€ We provide consultation on statistical and psychometric projects as well as helping organizations transition to -enabled work processes. Why ? Because it is: Powerful Flexible Free We rely on to drive all of our business functions. This platform has the capability to power a very wide variety of every day business functions1. For example, we use the platform to scrape data from websites, automate reports, and consolidate data into centralized repositories.
